thread.title: Chane Tesfaye
thread.title_full: Otto (GmbH & Co KG) bewertet von Chane Tesfaye

author: Chane Tesfaye
title: Chane Tesfaye
text:
As soon as i ordered a Laptop, with in the difference of one hour i recieved an email from otto that as my Laptop will be deliverd the next day in a particular time directly to my address. And then the next day at that particular time honestly i received my laptop from otto at my specific address.
Don't fear to order otto what ever you want. Immediatly otto will deliver your ordered directly to your specific address.
Thank you otto.
